name: Bonfire Site
description: A clearing in the desert with a permanent fire pit ringed by stones. Scorched earth spreads from the center. Dead wood stacked to one side. A place of gathering and ritual.
lighting_quality: Flickering and dynamic. Firelight throws moving shadows. Smoke obscures and reveals.
temperature_range: Hot near fire, cold beyond its circle. Sharp temperature gradient creates wind.
acoustic_quality: Crackling fire dominates. Voices must compete or pause. Sound rises upward.
objects_present: Stack of mesquite and sage wood
Scattered sitting stones in rough circle
Tin cups hanging from hooks on a post
atmosphere: Ceremonial. A space between control and wildness.
